content: Looking for implementers to test the Logica COVID-19 FHIR Profile Library IG at Connectathon 27. The Connectathon track specifies 3 use cases - Reviewing Covid Lab Results, Review of underlying medical conditions for suspected Covid-positive patients, and review of signs and symptoms of suspected Covid-positive patients â€” all highly relevant to the pandemic response by providing more consistency in how COVID-19 relevant data is represented in FHIR. Please consider joining.
